name: writesonic-chatsonic
label: Writesonic Chatsonic
description: This integration supports Writesonic's Chatsonic generative AI. A powerful language model with real time data

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: Specify the API key to access Chatsonic API. You need to have at least the Business plan subscription
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access Chatsonic API. You need to have at least the Business plan subscription

operations.title: Ask a Question
operations.description: Generates a completion for a given chat message using a pre-trained deep learning model.

parameters.title: Message
parameters.name: param@input_text
parameters.description: Specify the message for which you want to generate a chat completion. Use this field to write your question
parameters.tooltip: Specify the message for which you want to generate a chat completion. Use this field to write your question

parameters.title: Enable Google Search
parameters.name: param@google_enabled
parameters.description: If enabled, ChatSonic will use Google search results to answer the question. This is useful when trained AI model doesn't have an answer to the question
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, ChatSonic will use Google search results to answer the question. This is useful when trained AI model doesn't have an answer to the question

parameters.title: Language
parameters.name: param@language
parameters.description: Specify the language of the conversation
parameters.tooltip: Specify the language of the conversation

operations.title: Converse With Chatsonic
operations.description: Ask a question and get the AI answer based on the previous question/responses you had.

parameters.title: Message
parameters.name: param@input_text
parameters.description: Specify the message for which you want to generate a chat completion. Use this field to write your latest question within the conversation
parameters.tooltip: Specify the message for which you want to generate a chat completion. Use this field to write your latest question within the conversation

parameters.title: Messages
parameters.name: param@history_data
parameters.description: Specify the previous messages of the conversation
parameters.tooltip: Specify the previous messages of the conversation
